sources.title: Bad Lands (2023)
sources.description: Neri and her younger brother Jo make money by perpetrating fraud cases. One night, they happen to score hundreds of millions of yen. Since that time, they are chased by various nefarious people. (Source: AsianWiki) ~~ Adapted from the novel "Keisou" (勁草) by Kurokawa Hiroyuki (黒川博行).

metadata.Plot: A grifter and her loose-cannon brother get their hands on a massive amount of money, but their ill-gotten gains puts a huge target on their back.
metadata.Actors: Sakura Andô, Noriko Eguchi, Tokiko Kitagawa
